engChrName: I read the report on Langport.
engSearchText: I read the report on Langport.
jpnChrName: ──ラングポートの報告、 読ませてもらったわ。
jpnSearchText:
──ラングポートの報告、
読ませてもらったわ。

engChrName: Central Intelligence Department - Integrated Analysis Division
engSearchText:
Central Intelligence Department
- Integrated Analysis Division
jpnChrName: 中央情報省（Ｃ Ｉ Ｄ）統合分析室
jpnSearchText: 中央情報省（Ｃ Ｉ Ｄ）統合分析室

engChrName: For such a complicated series of events, it was impressively digestible.
engSearchText:
For such a complicated series of events, it was
impressively digestible.
jpnChrName: 複雑な状況だったようだけど 分かりやすくまとまっていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
複雑な状況だったようだけど
分かりやすくまとまっていたわ。

engChrName: Your remote management of the situation was superb as always, Kincaid.
engSearchText:
Your remote management of the situation was superb
as always, Kincaid.
jpnChrName: さすがの遠隔管理（リモートマネジメント）ね、キンケイド君。
jpnSearchText: さすがの遠隔管理（リモートマネジメント）ね、キンケイド君。

engChrName: You flatter me. Originally, I'd intended to travel there myself.
engSearchText:
You flatter me. Originally, I'd intended to travel
there myself.
jpnChrName: いえ、本当なら私自身が 出向くつもりだったのですが。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、本当なら私自身が
出向くつもりだったのですが。

engChrName: Unfortunately, with a certain A-rank bracer operating within Heiyue territory, such a trip became infeasible.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, with a certain A-rank bracer operating
within Heiyue territory, such a trip became infeasible.
jpnChrName: さすがに黒月のお膝元で Ａ級もいるとなると困難でした。
jpnSearchText:
さすがに黒月のお膝元で
Ａ級もいるとなると困難でした。

engChrName: Which led you to play your wild card in order to gain control.
engSearchText:
Which led you to play your wild card in order to
gain control.
jpnChrName: だからこそ“かき回し役”を当て込んで 効率的に状況をコントロールしたと。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ“かき回し役”を当て込んで
効率的に状況をコントロールしたと。

engChrName: A wise decision. Doing so kept our sleeper agents stationed there out of trouble.
engSearchText:
A wise decision. Doing so kept our sleeper agents
stationed there out of trouble.
jpnChrName: 良い判断ね──おかげで現地の 秘匿職員（スリーパー）も助かったことでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
良い判断ね──おかげで現地の
秘匿職員（スリーパー）も助かったことでしょう。

engChrName: I'm curious. Is he another longtime friend of yours, like that bracer?
engSearchText:
I'm curious. Is he another longtime friend of yours,
like that bracer?
jpnChrName: Ａ級さん共々、 君の昔馴染みだったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級さん共々、
君の昔馴染みだったかしら？

engChrName: I'd describe him more as a curse I can't be rid of.
engSearchText: I'd describe him more as a curse I can't be rid of.
jpnChrName: ……ただの腐れ縁ですよ。
jpnSearchText: ……ただの腐れ縁ですよ。

engChrName: Interesting. I heard he worked behind the scenes of Operation Mille Mirage as well.
engSearchText:
Interesting. I heard he worked behind the scenes of
Operation Mille Mirage as well.
jpnChrName: 《千の陽炎》の裏でも 動いていたそうだけど……ふむ。
jpnSearchText:
《千の陽炎》の裏でも
動いていたそうだけど……ふむ。

engChrName: Speaking of Arkride Solutions, can I get another update on their status?
engSearchText:
Speaking of Arkride Solutions, can I get another
update on their status?
jpnChrName: 『アークライド解決事務所』── 最新のレポートを貰えるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
『アークライド解決事務所』──
最新のレポートを貰えるかしら？

engChrName: I'm curious to learn about their latest addition.
engSearchText: I'm curious to learn about their latest addition.
jpnChrName: ここ最近の“従業員”も含めて。
jpnSearchText: ここ最近の“従業員”も含めて。

engChrName: As you wish. I'll have one of my subordinates deliver it to you later.
engSearchText:
As you wish. I'll have one of my subordinates deliver
it to you later.
jpnChrName: 了解しました。 後ほど部下に提出させます。
jpnSearchText:
了解しました。
後ほど部下に提出させます。

engChrName: On that note, I'll be taking my leave. If you'll excuse me, Chief Rouran.
engSearchText:
On that note, I'll be taking my leave. If you'll excuse
me, Chief Rouran.
jpnChrName: 自分はこれで── 失礼します、ロウラン室長。
jpnSearchText:
自分はこれで──
失礼します、ロウラン室長。

engChrName: Of course. Keep up the good work.
engSearchText: Of course. Keep up the good work.
jpnChrName: ええ、よろしくね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、よろしくね。

engChrName: Quite a talented and driven man, that one.
engSearchText: Quite a talented and driven man, that one.
jpnChrName: フフ、有り余る優秀さと 隠そうともしない野心……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、有り余る優秀さと
隠そうともしない野心……

engChrName: He may be a little too eager to take matters into his own hands at times, but I can't fault a young upstart for being ambitious.
engSearchText:
He may be a little too eager to take matters into his
own hands at times, but I can't fault a young upstart
for being ambitious.
jpnChrName: 少し独断専行が過ぎるけれど 若いうちはそれもいいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
少し独断専行が過ぎるけれど
若いうちはそれもいいでしょう。

engChrName: Still, the question remains as to how the society is linked to both the Republic and Almata.
engSearchText:
Still, the question remains as to how the society is
linked to both the Republic and Almata.
jpnChrName: ……しかしかの結社が今の共和国、 そして《Ａ》にどう絡んでくるのか──
jpnSearchText:
……しかしかの結社が今の共和国、
そして《Ａ》にどう絡んでくるのか──

engChrName: Seeing as help will be arriving, perhaps it's time I reach out for a little...catching up.
engSearchText:
Seeing as help will be arriving, perhaps it's time I
reach out for a little...catching up.
jpnChrName: “助っ人”も来るみたいだし、 久しぶりに連絡してみようかしら？
jpnSearchText:
“助っ人”も来るみたいだし、
久しぶりに連絡してみようかしら？

engChrName: A number of VIPs would soon descend upon the capital, ready to take part in moments both solemn and merry.
engSearchText:
A number of VIPs would soon descend upon the
capital, ready to take part in moments both solemn
and merry.
jpnChrName: ──そんな中、記念祭に出席するため 多くの重要人物が首都入りを果たすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
──そんな中、記念祭に出席するため
多くの重要人物が首都入りを果たすのだった。
